channel.title: Strange noise
channel.description:
Strange noise
My laptop seems to be emitting a strange noise (really really high pitched, pisses me off), right from where the CPU is (I have opened the laptop before, so I know where everything is).
The strange thing is, the laptop is turned off...
Anyone know what can be causing this?

item.title: Strange noise
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

My sisters laptop just started doing it, and yes, its off =S

Read full topic

item.title: Strange noise
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

[quote=“Drunkard18, post:13, topic:236918”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=312761.msg2495424#msg2495424 date=1224374130]

It sure isn’t good. The reason why it can make those sounds is because of capacitors, or do you really need the battery for those to work?

Found out it was just the speaker… Seems to be getting too much electricity when turned off.
[/quote]
Which will lead to a fire.[/quote]

Lies.

Unless the magnetic coil gets too hot and sets fire to paper cone, which is very unlikely.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange noise
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

runescape3dude:

Found out it was just the speaker… Seems to be getting too much electricity when turned off.

o.O It’s the damn speakers… wow… my brothers computer crashes every time he tries to mod his speakers. Coincidence?

Read full topic

item.title: Strange noise
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“Drunkard18, post:7, topic:236918”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=312761.msg2495172#msg2495172 date=1224362190]

It’s the battery prolly, contact the manufacture and replace it, my sister’s laptop just caught on fire because her battery got fuxxd.

A 9 year old laptop?
[/quote]
the fact your laptop is 9 years old is just going to make it catching on fire more probable.[/quote]
no shit?

Read full topic

item.title: Strange noise
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:236918”]Does it sound like the fan?

Remove the battery and see if it still happens.[/quote]
Not the fan… Only when battery in… Really really high pitched, can barely hear it.

Read full topic
